code: import axios from"axios";var API=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:5000'});API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem('tokens')){req.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('tokens')).token);}return req;});export var createPost=function createPost(dataURL){API.post("http://localhost:5000/posts/createpost",dataURL).then(function(response){console.log(response.status,response.data);});};export var updatePost=function updatePost(dataURL,id){API.patch("http://localhost:5000/posts/updatepost/".concat(id),dataURL);};export var likePost=function likePost(id){API.patch("http://localhost:5000/posts/".concat(id,"/likepost")).then(function(response){console.log(response.status,response.data);});};export var deletePost=function deletePost(id){API.delete("http://localhost:5000/posts/".concat(id)).then(function(response){console.log(response.status,response.data);});};export var signin=function signin(formData){return API.post('/user/signin',formData);};export var signup=function signup(formData){return API.post('/user/signup',formData);};
